common.loginRequired: Please sign in to access this feature
common.loginRequiredDesc: You need an account to use this feature. Sign in or create a free account to get started.

home.heroSubtitle: Discover our curated collection of premium marble, granite, and quartz surfaces. Each piece tells a story millions of years in the making.
home.premiumQualityDesc: Hand-selected stones from the world's finest quarries. Each slab is inspected for quality, color consistency, and structural integrity.
home.smartRecommendationsDesc: Our AI-powered assistant helps you find the perfect stone for your project, matching your style preferences and budget requirements.
home.instantPricingDesc: Get accurate cost estimates instantly with our built-in calculator. Factor in dimensions, edge profiles, and installation for transparent pricing.
home.ctaSubtitle: Browse our extensive collection or speak with our AI assistant to find the perfect stone for your project.
home.imageDisclaimer: Images are for reference only. Please refer to the actual product.

browse.title: Browse Our Stone Collection
browse.subtitle: Explore our collection of premium stone surfaces from top suppliers

stone.imageDisclaimer: Image is for representation purposes. Actual stone may vary in color, pattern, and texture. Please contact us to see actual samples.

auth.pinSent: Your PIN has been sent to your email
auth.customerDesc: Browse stones and manage your orders

quote.title: Request a Quote
quote.useAI: Not sure? Let AI recommend a stone

chat.title: AI Stone Consultant
chat.welcome: Welcome to Your Personal Stone Consultant
chat.welcomeMessage: I'm here to help you discover the perfect natural stone for your project. Whether you're renovating a kitchen, designing a bathroom, or planning a commercial space â€” I'll guide you through our collection.
chat.placeholder: Describe your project or ask about our stones...
chat.uploadImage: Upload a photo for personalized recommendations
chat.getQuote: Get a quote for this stone
chat.suggestion1: What stone is best for kitchen countertops?
chat.suggestion2: I need a white marble with gray veins
chat.suggestion3: Show me budget-friendly options for bathroom
chat.suggestion4: What's the difference between quartz and granite?
chat.tipUpload: Tip: Upload a photo of your space for personalized stone recommendations

calculator.title: Price Calculator
calculator.disclaimer: This is an estimate only. Final pricing depends on actual measurements.

threeDGen.title: 3D Scene Generator
threeDGen.subtitle: Transform your 2D photos into immersive 3D scenes using cutting-edge AI technology
threeDGen.uploadDesc: Upload a photo of your kitchen, bathroom, or any space to generate an interactive 3D scene
threeDGen.generating: Generating 3D scene... This may take up to 5 minutes
threeDGen.featureDisabled: 3D Scene Generation is not available for this store
threeDGen.step1Desc: Take a photo of your kitchen, bathroom, or any space you want to transform
threeDGen.step2Desc: Our AI reconstructs a detailed 3D scene from your 2D photo using World Labs technology
threeDGen.step3Desc: Navigate through an interactive 3D version of your space and visualize stone options

footer.description: Premium natural stone surfaces for residential and commercial projects. Discover the beauty of marble, granite, and quartz crafted by nature.
